feed.title: Coder Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.13.1
entry.content:
Changelog

[!NOTE] This is a mainline Coder release. We advise enterprise customers without a staging environment to install our latest stable release while we refine this version. Learn more about our Release Schedule.

Bugfixes

  • Dashboard: Allow downloading partial logs for unhealthy workspaes (#13761, 940afa1) (@Parkreiner)
  • Dashboard: Allow dormant workspace to be deleted (#13850, 01b30ea) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Remove organizationIds from AuthProvider to resolve "missing organization ID" (#13917, 80cbffe) (@aslilac)

Compare: v2.13.0...v2.13.1

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.13.1

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.12.5
entry.content:
Stable (since July 22, 2024)

Changelog

Bugfixes

  • Keep active users active in scim (#13955, 03c5d42) (@Emyrk)

    Caused an issue preventing workspaces from autostarting until the owning user logged in.

Compare: v2.12.4...v2.12.5

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.12.5

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.12.6
entry.content:
Stable (since August 01, 2024)

Changelog

Bug fixes

  • Fix workspace actions options (#13572, 07cd9ac) (@aslilac)

    Fixes an issue causing running workspaces to display a "start" option which leads to an unhealthy agent when used.

  • Change time format string to support minute-wise configuration (#14033, eacdfb9) (@angrycub)

    Fixes an issue which prevents specifing quiet hours down to the minute.

Compare: v2.12.5...v2.12.6

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.12.6

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.13.3
entry.content:
Changelog

[!NOTE] This is a mainline Coder release. We advise enterprise customers without a staging environment to install our latest stable release while we refine this version. Learn more about our Release Schedule.

Bug fixes

  • Change time format string to support minute-wise configuration (#14033, eacdfb9) (@angrycub)

    Fixes an issue preventing admins from specifing quiet hours down to the minute.

Compare: v2.13.2...v2.13.3

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.13.3

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.
